entry.def: A malformation in a person's body is a part which does not have the proper shape or form, especially when it has been like this since birth.

example.ex: ...babies with a high incidence of congenital malformations.
example.tran: 先天畸形发生率高的婴儿

means.word_mean: 1. an affliction in which some part of the body is misshapen or malformed
